valueMapping.description: Defines the source for a value

source.description: Location where the value should be retrieved

command.description: Command that should be executed on the host, using the output returned from the command as the value

env.description: Name of the environment variable on the host that contains the value

path.description: Path to a file on the host that contains the value

secret.description: Name of a secret in a secret store that contains the value

name.description: The name of the credential set.

namespace.description: The namespace in which the credential set is defined.

created.description: The date created, as an ISO-8601 Extended Format date string, as specified in the ECMAScript standard

modified.description: The date modified, as an ISO-8601 Extended Format date string, as specified in the ECMAScript standard

labels.description: Set of labels associated with the credential set.

credentials.description: Mappings of parameter names to their source value

schemaType.description: The resource type of the current document.

schemaVersion.description: Version of the credential set schema to which this document adheres
